original_text: It will seem like a false omen to those who have sworn allegiance to him, but he will remind them of their guilt and take them captive.
korean_text: 전에 그들에게 맹약한 자들은 그것을 거짓 점괘로 여길 것이나 바벨론 왕은 그 죄악을 기억하고 그 무리를 잡으리라

sentences.original_text: It will seem like a false omen
to those who have sworn allegiance to him
but he will remind them of their guilt
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 그들의 죄를 상기시킬 것입니다
